content: We need to go further than that. We need proportional representation on a per-party basis. There needs to be some type of “per party block group”, say every 10k, 20k, whatever, group of registered voters that party automatically gets a seat. Then it is up to the party to elect who they want to fill it. This should be on a national, truly federal level and not state-by-state. You would see huge increase in voters, much more participation, and many new parties would emerge. We could have a true representative democracy.
